name: @iml/device-scanner
description: Builds an in-memory representation of devices. Uses udev rules to handle change events.
author: IML Team

scripts.test: jest --projects IML.DeviceScannerDaemon  --projects IML.ScannerProxyDaemon --projects IML.DeviceAggregatorDaemon --projects IML.StatefulPromise --projects IML.Types --projects IML.Listeners/MountEmitter --projects IML.CommonLibrary
scripts.restore: dotnet restore Root.fsproj && dotnet restore device-scanner.sln
scripts.postbuild: cp-cli IML.Listeners/UdevListener/scripts/ dist/listeners && cp-cli IML.Listeners/UdevListener/udev-rules/ dist/listeners && cp-cli IML.Listeners/MountEmitter/systemd-units dist/listeners && cp-cli IML.DeviceScannerDaemon/systemd-units dist/device-scanner-daemon && cp-cli IML.DeviceAggregatorDaemon/systemd-units dist/device-aggregator-daemon && cp-cli IML.ScannerProxyDaemon/systemd-units dist/scanner-proxy-daemon && npm run docs
